justmobheads-fabric.duskconfig.title: Just Mob Heads Config
justmobheads-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_mobS: If enabled, overrides the 'overallDropChance' variable with the specific values.
justmobheads-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_enab: If enabled, allows Creepers, Skeletons and Zombies to drop their heads.
If enabled, the looting enchant will have an effect on the drop chance.
justmobheads-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_only: If enabled, only adult tameable mobs will have a chance to drop their head on death.
justmobheads-fabric.duskconfig.onlyAdult: Only Adult Mobs Drop Their Head
justmobheads-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_over: Sets the chance of a mob dropping its head if 'mobSpecificDropChances' is disabled.
justmobheads-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_cree: Sets head drop chance for Zombies, Skeletons and Creepers if 'enableStandardHeads' is enabled.
justmobheads-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_only: When enabled, only drops mob heads if the source on death is a charged creeper. This overwrites the onlyDropHeadsByPlayerKill value.
justmobheads-fabric.duskconfig.onlyDropH: Only Drop Heads By Charged Creeper
justmobheads-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_only: When enabled, only drops mob heads if the source on death is from a player.
justmobheads-fabric.duskconfig.onlyDropH: Only Drop Heads By Player Kill
